# opacity

**Instance Property**

Opacity of the point.

## Declaration

```swift
var opacity: CGFloat { get }
```

## Discussion

The opacity of a [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKStrokePoint-swift.struct] has a range of `0-2`, which is a multiplier of the [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKInk-swift.struct] opacity.

## Getting the point’s drawing data

- **size**: The size of this point.
- **secondaryScale**
